projects.name: Weather App
projects.description: Weather application that allows users to search for weather condition, temperature, humidity, and wind speed based on city name. Used Open Weather Map API to obtain real-time weather data.

projects.name: OrderUP Food Delivery App (WIP)
projects.description: Full stack food delivery application created with frontend website, admin panel, and backend server. Users can add food items to the cart, pay for the items, and place the order from the application.

projects.name: 2025 Website Portfolio
projects.description: Personal website portfolio to showcase my personal projects, education, and work experience. Contains a blog and a contact me feature.

projects.name: Python Mini Projects
projects.description: Python projects to get myself accustomed to the language. Includes projects, such as shortest path finder, WPM typing test, and number guesser.
